attributes.action: Allow the anonymous group to help the public without being labeled terrorists.
attributes.additional_details:
They do so much more to help than the police have ever done.

They are always looking after the common man without the need to be violent and if it was up to me they would be a part of national security and the police force.
attributes.background:
The British government need to allow anonymous to do what they need to do to help the public resolve issues that the government won't or are helping to cover up.

so far they have not caused harm to any member of society without good cause E.G. The Peadophiles in high places.
